attributes.action: ban omega 3 farmed from fish within 26 years or so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the moment we're in a dilema, Omega 3 fish oil is probably the most important dietry supplement on the planet. It also requires a good deal of overfishing to produce.
However with the advent of Omega 3 products such as Vpure now being farmed from Algie that problem could be eradicated by 2025 or so, especially if the government make a changeover stratagy.
